featured.text: Columbus brought it, along with many other new things, back to Europe with him.
Natives planted the fruit across South and Central America and in the Caribbean region, 23 Christopher Columbus first found it.

definition.zh_def: 哥倫布，一位意大利探險家，於1492年發現美洲大陸。
definition.en_def: Columbus, an Italian explorer who discovered the Americas in 1492.
definition.example: Christopher Columbus made his famous voyage across the Atlantic Ocean in 1492.
